title: View TCP Port Activity
summary: Here are a few tools to help you identify what your linux computer is doing on the network.
author: Gabe Koss

title: Caesar Cypher in Bash Oneliner
summary: A Caesar Cypher Script implemented in a bash onliner
author: Gabe Koss

title: Captain Haddock Insult Generator
summary: When I was a kid I loved Tintin comics and so a little while back I made a Captain Haddock insult generator using the various curses the Captain utters through out the series.

summary: A follow up look at the performance implications of using inject(), each() and each_with_object()

title: Create an Array of Symbols with %i{} in Ruby 2
summary: The helpful %i{} method can be used in Ruby 2 to return an array of strings as with %w{}.
author: Gabe Koss
